summary: An scriptwriter heads off to Nantucket to find some inspiration for his latest, overdue, assignment. He becomes embroiled in small-town hi-jinks of murder, sex and violence, when he decides to pass off the local weirdo's script as his own.
cast: Tom Gilroy|Margaret Welsh|Mitchell Lichtenstein|Nurit Koppel|Matthew Dixon|Neal Jones|Robert Whaley|John MacKay|David E. Dossey
title: Ratchet
